Dataset ( MNIST )

path = untar_data(URLs.MNIST)

class InvisibleTensor[source]

InvisibleTensor(x, **kwargs) :: TensorBase

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

generate_noise[source]

generate_noise(fn, size=64)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
dblock = DataBlock(blocks = (TransformBlock, ImageBlock(cls=PILImageBW)),
                   get_x = generate_noise,
                   get_items = get_image_files,
                   splitter = IndexSplitter([]),
                   batch_tfms=Normalize.from_stats(mean=0.5, std=0.5)
                   )
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
dls = dblock.dataloaders(path, bs=4)
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
dls.show_batch()
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

get_dls[source]

get_dls(path, bs=4, num_workers=2)

Given image path, load the images. Batch size is specified by bs (default=4).

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
dls      = get_dls(path, bs=4)
noise, x = dls.one_batch()

test_eq(noise.shape, (4, 64, 1, 1))
test_eq(x.shape, (4, 1, 28, 28))
{% endraw %}
